channel.title: Important folders are classified as "hidden" and they cannot be used
channel.description:
When i open my source or my client, i notice that some folders are transparent, and its leading to some errors that i get.
the folders are classified as hidden folders, if i click to show hidden folders its the only time they show up, but transparent tho and run.bat cannot locate them
Im almost positive it has somthing to do with when i would put themes on my jailbroken ipod, i needed to convert mp3 format to caf, and i went under control panel-folder options- and the view tab. i changed up some things and im not sure what my old format was like.
if anyone has windows xp can you tell me which things you have checked off? :rolleyes:

item.title: Important folders are classified as "hidden" and they cannot be used
item.dc:creator: @theronp theronp
item.description:
@theronp wrote:

or u can copy whats inside those folders and paste em 2 replica folders you make on your desktop then delete the hidden 1s and put the 1s on you desktop back in the folder

Read full topic

Have you tried, right clicking on the hidden folders going to properties and un-checking hidden
